links.title: Why Tesla Can't Live Up to This Analyst's Expectations
links.description: But electric cars themselves just haven't caught on in popularity. True, lower gasoline prices have made Americans reluctant to make the switch, but the real revolution in the car industry will more likely involve ride-sharing technology. And even though electric power will certainly play a part, Tesla's behind in this race.

links.title: Queen & Annie Lennox & David Bowie - Under Pressure - HD
links.description: No dia 20 de Abril de 1992, várias bandas de Rock que faziam sucesso naquela época e amigos reuniram-se no Estádio de Wembley em Londres para prestarem homenagem a Freddie Mercury, vocalista da banda inglesa Queen, falecido no dia 24 de Novembro de 1991 em consequência de uma broncopneumonia causada pela AIDS.

Is Tesla's New Business Going to Be Bigger Than Its Cars? -- Tech Roundup $TSLA @teslamotors http://bit.ly/2n58HwR

links.title: Is Tesla's New Business Going to Be Bigger Than Its Cars? -- Tech Roundup
links.description: Tesla Motors ( TSLA) just keeps churning out the infrastructure projects. While bearish investors continue to shoot against the company for missing on automotive deliveries or needing to raise capital, it's quietly growing an entirely new business. Earlier this year, Tesla finished building and installing the nearly-400 refrigerator-sized batteries that are now being used in an infrastructure project based outside Los Angeles.
